node.detail_zh: 患者為順寧路敬福護理院院友，無外遊紀錄，8 月 4 日經救護車送入北大嶼山醫院，有發燒及肺炎病徵，及後轉送瑪嘉烈醫院深切治療部留醫，延至當晚 9 時 47 分離世。
node.detail_en: The patient is a resident at King Fok Nursing Home, Shun Ning Road, Cheung Sha Wan, with no travel history. He was transferred to North Lantau Hospital by ambulance on August 4, having then exhibited fever and pneumonia. He was then transferred to the intensive care unit of Princess Margaret Hospital, and passed away at 9:47 p.m.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en:
King Fok Nursing
Home, Shun Ning Road
groups.description_zh: 患者為深水埗順寧道敬福護理院院友、照顧員及工作人員。
groups.description_en: The patients of this cluster include residents, caretakers, and staff members of the King Fok Nursing Home, Shun Ning Road.
